source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT GENERIC_CALL.ID AS ID
  FROM [STG].[HILLEBRAND_ALL_IDS] AS GENERIC_CALL
LEFT JOIN [STG].[HILLEBRAND_SHIPMENTS_CONTACTS_IDS] AS CONTACTS_IDS
ON GENERIC_CALL.ID = CONTACTS_IDS.ID
WHERE CONTACTS_IDS.ID IS NULL

SELECT
MAX(TIME_STAMP) AS TIME_STAMP,
MAX(PIPELINE_NAME) AS PIPELINE_NAME,
MAX(PIPELINE_RUN_ID) AS PIPELINE_RUN_ID,
MAX(JOB_ID) AS JOB_ID,
MAX(ACTIVITY_RUN_ID) AS ACTIVITY_RUN_ID,
MAX(EXECUTION_START_TIME) AS EXECUTION_START_TIME,
MAX(EXECUTION_END_TIME) AS EXECUTION_END_TIME,
MAX(ERROR_ERROR_CODE) AS ERROR_ERROR_CODE,
MAX(ERROR_MESSAGES) AS ERROR_MESSAGES,
MAX(ERROR_FAILURE_TYPE) AS ERROR_FAILURE_TYPE,
MAX(ERROR_TARGET) AS ERROR_TARGET,
MAX(EXECUTION_DETAILS) AS EXECUTION_DETAILS,
MAX(STATUS_CODE) AS STATUS_CODE,
MAX(EXECUTION_STATUS) AS EXECUTION_STATUS,
MAX(DURATION) AS DURATION,
MAX(RECOVERY_STATUS) AS RECOVERY_STATUS
FROM(
SELECT 
CASE WHEN SUBSTRING(VALUE,0,11) = 'TIMESTAMP=' THEN SUBSTRING(VALUE,11,LEN(VALUE)) END AS TIME_STAMP,
CASE WHEN SUBSTRING(VALUE,0,15) = 'PIPELINE_NAME=' THEN SUBSTRING(VALUE,15,LEN(VALUE)) END AS PIPELINE_NAME,
CASE WHEN SUBSTRING(VALUE,0,17) = 'PIPELINE_RUN_ID=' THEN SUBSTRING(VALUE,17,LEN(VALUE)) END AS PIPELINE_RUN_ID,
CASE WHEN SUBSTRING(VALUE,0,8) = 'JOB_ID=' THEN SUBSTRING(VALUE,8,LEN(VALUE)) END AS JOB_ID,
CASE WHEN SUBSTRING(VALUE,0,17) = 'ACTIVITY_RUN_ID=' THEN SUBSTRING(VALUE,17,LEN(VALUE)) END AS ACTIVITY_RUN_ID,
CASE WHEN SUBSTRING(VALUE,0,22) = 'EXECUTION_START_TIME=' THEN SUBSTRING(VALUE,22,LEN(VALUE)) END AS EXECUTION_START_TIME,
CASE WHEN SUBSTRING(VALUE,0,20) = 'EXECUTION_END_TIME=' THEN SUBSTRING(VALUE,20,LEN(VALUE)) END AS EXECUTION_END_TIME,
CASE WHEN SUBSTRING(VALUE,0,18) = 'ERROR_ERROR_CODE=' THEN SUBSTRING(VALUE,18,LEN(VALUE)) END AS ERROR_ERROR_CODE,
CASE WHEN SUBSTRING(VALUE,0,15) = 'ERROR_MESSAGE=' THEN SUBSTRING(VALUE,15,LEN(VALUE)) END AS ERROR_MESSAGES,
CASE WHEN SUBSTRING(VALUE,0,20) = 'ERROR_FAILURE_TYPE=' THEN SUBSTRING(VALUE,20,LEN(VALUE)) END AS ERROR_FAILURE_TYPE,
CASE WHEN SUBSTRING(VALUE,0,14) = 'ERROR_TARGET=' THEN SUBSTRING(VALUE,14,LEN(VALUE)) END AS ERROR_TARGET,
CASE WHEN SUBSTRING(VALUE,0,19) = 'EXECUTION_DETAILS=' THEN SUBSTRING(VALUE,19,LEN(VALUE)) END AS EXECUTION_DETAILS,
CASE WHEN SUBSTRING(VALUE,0,13) = 'STATUS_CODE=' THEN SUBSTRING(VALUE,13,LEN(VALUE)) END AS STATUS_CODE,
CASE WHEN SUBSTRING(VALUE,0,18) = 'EXECUTION_STATUS=' THEN SUBSTRING(VALUE,18,LEN(VALUE)) END AS EXECUTION_STATUS,
CASE WHEN SUBSTRING(VALUE,0,10) = 'DURATION=' THEN SUBSTRING(VALUE,10,LEN(VALUE)) END AS DURATION,
CASE WHEN SUBSTRING(VALUE,0,17) = 'RECOVERY_STATUS=' THEN SUBSTRING(VALUE,17,LEN(VALUE)) END AS RECOVERY_STATUS
FROM [STG].[HILLEBRAND_STRING_LOG] AS LOGS CROSS APPLY STRING_SPLIT(FAIL_RESULT,'|') AS SPLIT) AS SUBQUERY

SELECT
MAX(TIME_STAMP) AS TIME_STAMP,
MAX(PIPELINE_NAME) AS PIPELINE_NAME,
MAX(PIPELINE_RUN_ID) AS PIPELINE_RUN_ID,
MAX(JOB_ID) AS JOB_ID,
MAX(ACTIVITY_RUN_ID) AS ACTIVITY_RUN_ID,
MAX(EXECUTION_START_TIME) AS EXECUTION_START_TIME,
MAX(EXECUTION_END_TIME) AS EXECUTION_END_TIME,
MAX(ERROR_ERROR_CODE) AS ERROR_ERROR_CODE,
MAX(ERROR_MESSAGES) AS ERROR_MESSAGES,
MAX(ERROR_FAILURE_TYPE) AS ERROR_FAILURE_TYPE,
MAX(ERROR_TARGET) AS ERROR_TARGET,
MAX(EXECUTION_DETAILS) AS EXECUTION_DETAILS,
MAX(STATUS_CODE) AS STATUS_CODE,
MAX(EXECUTION_STATUS) AS EXECUTION_STATUS,
MAX(DURATION) AS DURATION,
MAX(RECOVERY_STATUS) AS RECOVERY_STATUS
FROM(
SELECT 
CASE WHEN SUBSTRING(VALUE,0,11) = 'TIMESTAMP=' THEN SUBSTRING(VALUE,11,LEN(VALUE)) END AS TIME_STAMP,
CASE WHEN SUBSTRING(VALUE,0,15) = 'PIPELINE_NAME=' THEN SUBSTRING(VALUE,15,LEN(VALUE)) END AS PIPELINE_NAME,
CASE WHEN SUBSTRING(VALUE,0,17) = 'PIPELINE_RUN_ID=' THEN SUBSTRING(VALUE,17,LEN(VALUE)) END AS PIPELINE_RUN_ID,
CASE WHEN SUBSTRING(VALUE,0,8) = 'JOB_ID=' THEN SUBSTRING(VALUE,8,LEN(VALUE)) END AS JOB_ID,
CASE WHEN SUBSTRING(VALUE,0,17) = 'ACTIVITY_RUN_ID=' THEN SUBSTRING(VALUE,17,LEN(VALUE)) END AS ACTIVITY_RUN_ID,
CASE WHEN SUBSTRING(VALUE,0,22) = 'EXECUTION_START_TIME=' THEN SUBSTRING(VALUE,22,LEN(VALUE)) END AS EXECUTION_START_TIME,
CASE WHEN SUBSTRING(VALUE,0,20) = 'EXECUTION_END_TIME=' THEN SUBSTRING(VALUE,20,LEN(VALUE)) END AS EXECUTION_END_TIME,
CASE WHEN SUBSTRING(VALUE,0,18) = 'ERROR_ERROR_CODE=' THEN SUBSTRING(VALUE,18,LEN(VALUE)) END AS ERROR_ERROR_CODE,
CASE WHEN SUBSTRING(VALUE,0,15) = 'ERROR_MESSAGE=' THEN SUBSTRING(VALUE,15,LEN(VALUE)) END AS ERROR_MESSAGES,
CASE WHEN SUBSTRING(VALUE,0,20) = 'ERROR_FAILURE_TYPE=' THEN SUBSTRING(VALUE,20,LEN(VALUE)) END AS ERROR_FAILURE_TYPE,
CASE WHEN SUBSTRING(VALUE,0,14) = 'ERROR_TARGET=' THEN SUBSTRING(VALUE,14,LEN(VALUE)) END AS ERROR_TARGET,
CASE WHEN SUBSTRING(VALUE,0,19) = 'EXECUTION_DETAILS=' THEN SUBSTRING(VALUE,19,LEN(VALUE)) END AS EXECUTION_DETAILS,
CASE WHEN SUBSTRING(VALUE,0,13) = 'STATUS_CODE=' THEN SUBSTRING(VALUE,13,LEN(VALUE)) END AS STATUS_CODE,
CASE WHEN SUBSTRING(VALUE,0,18) = 'EXECUTION_STATUS=' THEN SUBSTRING(VALUE,18,LEN(VALUE)) END AS EXECUTION_STATUS,
CASE WHEN SUBSTRING(VALUE,0,10) = 'DURATION=' THEN SUBSTRING(VALUE,10,LEN(VALUE)) END AS DURATION,
CASE WHEN SUBSTRING(VALUE,0,17) = 'RECOVERY_STATUS=' THEN SUBSTRING(VALUE,17,LEN(VALUE)) END AS RECOVERY_STATUS
FROM [STG].[HILLEBRAND_STRING_LOG] AS LOGS CROSS APPLY STRING_SPLIT(FAIL_RESULT,'|') AS SPLIT) AS SUBQUERY

WITH CONTACTS_PAGES AS (
	SELECT
		ID_NUMBER_OF_PAGES AS ID_NUMBER_OF_PAGES,
		SUBSTRING(ID_NUMBER_OF_PAGES,CHARINDEX('=',ID_NUMBER_OF_PAGES)+1,LEN(ID_NUMBER_OF_PAGES)) AS NUMBER_OF_PAGES,
		1 AS NUMBER
	FROM STG.HILLEBRAND_CONTACTS_PAGES
	UNION ALL
	SELECT
		ID_NUMBER_OF_PAGES AS ID_NUMBER_OF_PAGES,
		SUBSTRING(ID_NUMBER_OF_PAGES,CHARINDEX('=',ID_NUMBER_OF_PAGES)+1,LEN(ID_NUMBER_OF_PAGES)) AS NUMBER_OF_PAGES,
		(NUMBER + 1 )
	FROM CONTACTS_PAGES
		WHERE NUMBER < NUMBER_OF_PAGES
)
SELECT
	CONCAT(SUBSTRING(ID_NUMBER_OF_PAGES,1,CHARINDEX('=',ID_NUMBER_OF_PAGES)),NUMBER) AS ID_AND_NUMBER_OF_PAGES
FROM CONTACTS_PAGES

SELECT
MAX(TIME_STAMP) AS TIME_STAMP,
MAX(PIPELINE_NAME) AS PIPELINE_NAME,
MAX(PIPELINE_RUN_ID) AS PIPELINE_RUN_ID,

CASE WHEN SUBSTRING(VALUE,0,22) = 'EXECUTION_START_TIME=' THEN SUBSTRING(VALUE,22,LEN(VALUE)) END AS EXECUTION_START_TIME,
CASE WHEN SUBSTRING(VALUE,0,20) = 'EXECUTION_END_TIME=' THEN SUBSTRING(VALUE,20,LEN(VALUE)) END AS EXECUTION_END_TIME,
CASE WHEN SUBSTRING(VALUE,0,18) = 'ERROR_ERROR_CODE=' THEN SUBSTRING(VALUE,18,LEN(VALUE)) END AS ERROR_ERROR_CODE,
CASE WHEN SUBSTRING(VALUE,0,15) = 'ERROR_MESSAGE=' THEN SUBSTRING(VALUE,15,LEN(VALUE)) END AS ERROR_MESSAGES,
CASE WHEN SUBSTRING(VALUE,0,20) = 'ERROR_FAILURE_TYPE=' THEN SUBSTRING(VALUE,20,LEN(VALUE)) END AS ERROR_FAILURE_TYPE,
CASE WHEN SUBSTRING(VALUE,0,14) = 'ERROR_TARGET=' THEN SUBSTRING(VALUE,14,LEN(VALUE)) END AS ERROR_TARGET,
CASE WHEN SUBSTRING(VALUE,0,19) = 'EXECUTION_DETAILS=' THEN SUBSTRING(VALUE,19,LEN(VALUE)) END AS EXECUTION_DETAILS,
CASE WHEN SUBSTRING(VALUE,0,13) = 'STATUS_CODE=' THEN SUBSTRING(VALUE,13,LEN(VALUE)) END AS STATUS_CODE,
CASE WHEN SUBSTRING(VALUE,0,18) = 'EXECUTION_STATUS=' THEN SUBSTRING(VALUE,18,LEN(VALUE)) END AS EXECUTION_STATUS,
CASE WHEN SUBSTRING(VALUE,0,10) = 'DURATION=' THEN SUBSTRING(VALUE,10,LEN(VALUE)) END AS DURATION,
CASE WHEN SUBSTRING(VALUE,0,17) = 'RECOVERY_STATUS=' THEN SUBSTRING(VALUE,17,LEN(VALUE)) END AS RECOVERY_STATUS
FROM [STG].[HILLEBRAND_STRING_LOG] AS LOGS CROSS APPLY STRING_SPLIT(FAIL_RESULT,'|') AS SPLIT) AS SUBQUERY

MAX(PIPELINE_RUN_ID) AS PIPELINE_RUN_ID,
MAX(JOB_ID) AS JOB_ID,
MAX(ACTIVITY_RUN_ID) AS ACTIVITY_RUN_ID,
MAX(EXECUTION_START_TIME) AS EXECUTION_START_TIME,
MAX(EXECUTION_END_TIME) AS EXECUTION_END_TIME,
MAX(ERROR_ERROR_CODE) AS ERROR_ERROR_CODE,
MAX(ERROR_MESSAGES) AS ERROR_MESSAGES,
MAX(ERROR_FAILURE_TYPE) AS ERROR_FAILURE_TYPE,
MAX(ERROR_TARGET) AS ERROR_TARGET,
MAX(EXECUTION_DETAILS) AS EXECUTION_DETAILS,
MAX(STATUS_CODE) AS STATUS_CODE,
MAX(EXECUTION_STATUS) AS EXECUTION_STATUS,

CASE WHEN SUBSTRING(VALUE,0,8) = 'JOB_ID=' THEN SUBSTRING(VALUE,8,LEN(VALUE)) END AS JOB_ID,

CASE WHEN SUBSTRING(VALUE,0,14) = 'ERROR_TARGET=' THEN SUBSTRING(VALUE,14,LEN(VALUE)) END AS ERROR_TARGET,
CASE WHEN SUBSTRING(VALUE,0,19) = 'EXECUTION_DETAILS=' THEN SUBSTRING(VALUE,19,LEN(VALUE)) END AS EXECUTION_DETAILS,

CASE WHEN SUBSTRING(VALUE,0,18) = 'EXECUTION_STATUS=' THEN SUBSTRING(VALUE,18,LEN(VALUE)) END AS EXECUTION_STATUS,
CASE WHEN SUBSTRING(VALUE,0,10) = 'DURATION=' THEN SUBSTRING(VALUE,10,LEN(VALUE)) END AS DURATION,

FROM [STG].[HILLEBRAND_STRING_LOG] AS LOGS CROSS APPLY STRING_SPLIT(FAIL_RESULT,'|') AS SPLIT) AS SUBQUERY
